_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
December 11th, 1:40 PM
Good afternoon Sugarbush friends! We've picked up 5 inches over the past 24 hours, and the Sugarbush snow globe shows no signs of slowing down until Friday!  Tomorrow, expect a partially sun filled sky with base temps in the low 20's and summit temps in the low teens, with 40-55 mph winds which may affect lift operations. Tonight, were expecting a light refresh of 1-2 inches, carrying into tomorrow for a total of 3-5 inches of new snow.

We will be getting down on 64 trails, 4 lifts, and 254 skiable acres.  There's a ton of natural terrain open including Castlerock hiking 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM. Conditions are still thin and variable on natural terrain so please use caution when on those trails. Look forward to some packed powder conditions tomorrow along with top tier corduroys on 18 trails. Snowmakers continue on mid-mountain including Downspout, Lower Downspout, and Lower Jester, and will be turning off mid-day tomorrow. Please be aware these trails are open with snowmaking and whalebacks on them.
 
Gate House is the place to be today! Soft, powdery turns await on Sleeper Chutes, while smooth groomers like Pushover and Slowpoke keep things easy and fun. Lower mountain lifts spin 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM and upper mountain lifts run 9:00 AM - 3:45 PM. Reminder that Super Bravo and Heaven's Gate terrain continues to be for advanced skiers and riders at this time. Mt. Ellen hike park is back open with 20 features for your freestyle enjoyment, starting at 10:00 AM until 3:00 PM for passholders. Both Lincoln Peak Evening and Morning Route is open for Uphill Travel, check out our Uphill Travel Policy for more info.

Through Friday Dec. 12th, kids 12 and under ski and ride for free at Sugarbush. Whether your little ones are just starting out or already shredding, this is the perfect time to plan your trip to the mountain. Ready for this one? If you purchase a kids Smith helmet through 12/12, you'll receive a gift. Join us at 6:00 PM, Dec 13th at Gate House Lodge for our Wall of Fame celebration, followed by live music at 7:00 PM, from The Talking Dreads during Sugarbash, bust out your boldest, or ugliest, holiday sweater for our fan-favorite ugly sweater contest. Check out all of our winter events.

Have an Ikon Base Pass? Come ski before 12/25 and earn a voucher for an unrestricted lift ticket for yourself to be used any day here for the rest of the season. Grab up to five of these tickets simply by skiing and riding here before Christmas. Don't miss out on all of our deals including 50% off December lodging through December 26th.
